title: Photography
details: Capture your event's special moments with professional photography services.

title: Catering Service
details: Delicious catering options tailored to your event's theme and dietary preferences.
packageIncludes: Appetizers in menu, Main Course in menu, Desserts in menu

title: DJ and Entertainment
details: Hire a professional DJ to keep the party going with great music and entertainment.
packageIncludes: Pop Genre, Hip-Hop Genre, Electronic Genre

title: Venue Rental
details: Rent a beautiful event venue for your special occasion. Accommodates up to 200 guests.

title: Decoration Services
details: Transform your venue with beautiful decorations to match your event's theme.
packageIncludes: Rustic Theme, Elegant Theme, Vintage Theme

title: Transportation
details: Arrange transportation for your guests to and from the event location.
packageIncludes: Limousine vihicle option, Shuttle Bus vihicle option, Vintage Car vihicle option
